title: Strengthening Pedagogical Practical Competencies: Natural Disaster Education and Global Collaboration: Data-Driven Secondary Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Students can interpret natural disaster occurrence patterns and global trends in prevention education through literature analysis and statistical tools
Learners can design disaster response strategies in a simulation environment and apply them to virtual reality (VR)-based scenarios
Learners can propose school-level global collaboration plans through analysis of international disaster research cooperation cases
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
